statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ 2 \\ -17 \\ 29 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ 2 \\ -17 \\ 29 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
